description: Support to the Development of Justice & Rule of Law (SP)

subproject.corporate outcome: Effective, responsive, accessible and fair justice systems promote the rule of law, including both formal and informal processes, with due consideration on the rights of the poor, women and vulnerable groups
subproject.description:
In line with its commitment to assist the Republic of Iraq to encourage respect for the rule of law and increase the effectiveness of the judicial sector as a whole, UNDP-Iraq will implement a pilot model court in Iraq, build the capacity of the Iraqi Judicial Training Institute, support development of alternative dispute resolution mechanisms for civil law issues, and will implement a number of key activities to support reform of the penitentiary system, including its management and treatment of women and juveniles. Outputs are:
1. Pilot court is established in Baghdad
2. Select curriculum of the Iraqi Judicial Training Institute reformed
3. Penitentiary system Reformed
4. ILD phase III is implemented
subproject.gender code: Gender equality as a significant objective
subproject.title: Reforming Judicial Training

title: Support to the development of Justice and Rule of Law
